#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

struct cod{
       int x,y;
       };
cod arr[100001];
double mat[10001];



int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    printf("\n");
    int N;
    
   
    
    int p,q;

    
    for(int i = 0 ; i < 10001; i++){
           mat[i] = -1.0;
                    }
           
    
    for(int t  = 0; t < test; t++)
    {
            
            scanf("%d",&N);
            cod COD;
            for(int i = 0; i < N;i++)
            {
                    scanf("%d %d",&p,&q);
                    COD.x = p;
                    COD.y = q;
                    arr[i] = COD;
            }
            double slope;      
            int co;
            int max1 = 2;
            int max2 = 2;
            int max3 = 2;
            for(int i = 0; i < N; i++){
                    max1 = 1;
                    max2 = 0;
                    co = 0;
                    for(int j  = 0; j < N; j++){
                         if(i != j){   
                         if((arr[j].x-arr[i].x) == 0){slope = 15001;}
                         else{
                      slope = fabs((double)(arr[j].y - arr[i].y)/(double)(arr[j].x - arr[i].x));
                       }
                         mat[co++] = slope;
                         //mat[j][i] = slope;
                         }
                      }
            
          //  for(int i = 0; i < N-1; i++)
           // {
             //       cout << mat[i] <<"  ";
           // }
           // cout <<endl;
        //    cout <<"after sort :" <<endl;
            sort(mat,mat+N-1);
           // qsort (mat, N-1, sizeof(int), compare);            
           /*
            for(int i = 0; i < N-1; i++)
            {
                   cout << mat[i] <<"  ";
                   
            }
            system("pause");
            cout << endl<< endl; 
            */
            
            for(int i = 0; i < N-1; i++){
            //        cout << mat[i] << "   "<<mat[i+1] << endl;
                    
                    if(mat[i] == mat[i+1])max1++;
                    
                    else{
                     //    cout << "max1 " << max1 << endl;
                    if(max1 > max2){max2 = max1;max1 = 2;}
                    }
                    
            }
            if(max2 > max3)max3 = max2;
            
            //cout << " max3 " << max3 << endl;
            //system("pause");
            
            
            }
            printf("%d\n",max3);
            
    }
    
    
    return 0;
}
